ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer
des: "Tall glasses overflowing with root beer and vanilla ice cream. Top with whipped cream and cherries for a touch of elegance."
ins: Place 1 scoop of ice cream into each of two tall glasses. Pour root beer carefully over the ice cream. Add another scoop and repeat.  If possible, repeat again. Top each with whipped cream and cherries.
